Dear Valued Customer,
Welcome to NCR Mobile Pay! Now that you're offering contactless payments, let your customers know. From customizable table tents to social post templates, we've got you covered.
Download free print files or digital images separately using the buttons below. ${CTAText3} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> ${CTA2Text4} <[[${CTA2URL}?${url-parameter}]]> Don't forget to check out our full marketing toolkit here <[[https://www.ncr.com/restaurants/marketingtoolkit]]>.
How else can we help you right now? Please let us know. Wishing all the success in the world!
